Name: BattleSpace
About the game: BattleSpace is a sci-fi flash game designed to play in the comfort of your web browser. In this free online strategy game, you step into the role of an Admiral, building a solar system in the depths of a faraway galaxy. Every player starts in their own 'Union', or guild, with the option of banding together and creating an interstellar empire. Play solo, PvE, PvP, as a combatant or gathererâ€”or all of the above! The options are limitless once you entire deep space. The ultimate goal is to conquer the Giant Planet before the season's ends, but with so many ways of getting there, BattleSpace tailors to all playstyles.
